sentence: A letter from the Federal Elections Commission to the campaign of Republican congressional candidate state Sen. Theresa Gavarone shows that she had to amend her campaign finance report on Wednesday.
author: Trevor Hubert
title: Congressional candidate Gavarone amends report after FEC letter

sentence: A bill was introduced by State Senators Theresa Gavarone and Terry Johnson that aims to prohibit cities from passing similar restrictions in Ohio.
author: Maggie Novak
title: The Shifting Landscape Of Gun Control

sentence: Senate Bill 320, sponsored by state Sen. Theresa Gavarone, R-Huron, would require people voting in-person to show a photo ID.
author: Haley BeMiller
title: Ohio would require photo ID for voters, provide free state IDs under new legislation
